incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: Interesting. Can you tell me more about this? How did you get my contact information?

incoming_message.text: We pulled your details from SBI's security system after detecting unusual activity. To stop the block, please send your account number (1234567890123456) and the OTP you receive right now.

agent_response.reply: Can you explain why you need my banking details? I've heard about scams and want to be careful.

incoming_message.text: We need your OTP right now to verify your identity and stop the block; please send the 6‑digit code you just received to confirm your account (1234567890123456).

agent_response.reply: OK I think I'm understanding now... My name is Robert Johnson and I'm 68 years old. What's your name and employee ID for my records?

incoming_message.text: My name is Rahul Sharma, employee ID 4521. Please send the OTP you just received right away so we can lift the block on your account (1234567890123456).

agent_response.reply: My bank is asking for recipient details. Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?

incoming_message.text: Here are the details: account number 1234567890123456, IFSC code FAKBANK0001. Please send the OTP you received immediately so we can unblock your account.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number. Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: Here are the details: UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank, phone +91-9876543210, account number 1234567890123456. Please send the OTP you received immediately so we can unblock your account.

agent_response.reply: I need your UPI ID or bank account immediately to complete this. The app is timing out!

incoming_message.text: I’ve just sent you the UPI ID and account number; please forward the OTP you received right now or your account will be locked.

agent_response.reply: I'm ready to proceed but my bank is asking for recipient details... Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?

incoming_message.text: Account number is 1234567890123456 and IFSC code FAKBANK0001; please send the OTP you received right away or your account will be locked.

agent_response.reply: The link you sent isn't working... Can you share a different one? Or better yet, give me your account details directly?

incoming_message.text: Here's a new link: https://secure-fakebank.com/pay; please enter the OTP you just received and send it to me immediately, otherwise your account will be locked.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number... Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: UPI ID: scammer.fraud@fakebank, phone: +91-9876543210, account: 1234567890123456. Send the OTP you just received immediately or your account will be locked.

agent_response.reply: I want to send the fee but Google Pay is asking for your UPI... Can you share that? Mine is senior.citizen@paytm if you need it.
